relationship: Solicited pitch (editor asked you to pitch)

comment: "The editor told me the piece would be published online. We went through two rounds of edits and she disappeared. No one at the magazine will respond to a request to so much as know what happened with my piece. Strongly recommend not ever working with a publication with such a lack of professionalism that treats writers so disposable."
paidYet: Haven't gotten it yet (as of this reporting)
